title: Ricangel de Leça
text:
Ricangel Emilio de Leça (born 1 August 1981) is an <a href="Aruba">Aruba</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> referee and former player. He became a <a href="FIFA%20International%20Referees%20List">FIFA List</a> referee in 2015.
Before becoming an international referee, de Leça played as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> for the <a href="Aruba%20national%20football%20team">Aruban national team</a>, and Aruban clubs <a href="SV%20La%20Fama">SV La Fama</a> and <a href="SV%20Dakota">SV Dakota</a>.
